titleStmt.title: The history of the most vile Dimagoras who by treachery and poison blasted the incomparable beauty of divine Parthenia : inter-woven with the history of Amoronzo and Celania / by John Quarles.
titleStmt.author: Quarles, John, 1624-1665.
